comment: General Qassem Soleimani has killed or badly wounded thousands of Americans over an extended period of time , and was plotting to kill many more ... but got caught ! He was directly and indirectly responsible for the death of millions of people , including the recent large number ...
amr:
# ::snt General Qassem Soleimani has killed or badly wounded thousands of Americans over an extended period of time , and was plotting to kill many more ... but got caught ! He was directly and indirectly responsible for the death of millions of people , including the recent large number ...
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (o / or
                        :op1 (k / kill-01
                              :ARG0 (p / person
                                    :name (n / name
                                          :op1 "Qassem"
                                          :op2 "Soleimani")
                                    :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                                          :ARG2 (g / general)))
                              :ARG1 (p2 / person
                                    :mod (c2 / country
                                          :name (n2 / name
                                                :op1 "America"))
                                    :quant (m2 / multiple
                                          :op1 1000)))
                        :op2 (w / wound-01
                              :ARG0 p
                              :ARG1 p2
                              :ARG1-of (b / bad-05))
                        :duration (p3 / period
                              :ARG1-of (e / extend-01)
                              :mod (t / time)))
                  :op2 (p4 / plot-01
                        :ARG0 p
                        :ARG1 (k2 / kill-01
                              :ARG0 p
                              :ARG1 (p5 / person
                                    :mod (m3 / more
                                          :quant (m4 / many))))))
            :ARG2 (c3 / catch-03
                  :ARG1 p))
      :snt2 (r / responsible-01
            :ARG0 (h2 / he)
            :ARG1 (d / die-01
                  :ARG1 (p6 / person
                        :quant (m5 / multiple
                              :op1 1000000)
                        :ARG2-of (ii / include-91
                              :ARG1 (n3 / number
                                    :mod (l / large)
                                    :time (r2 / recent))))
                  :ARG1-of (d2 / direct-02
                        :polarity -))
            :ARG1-of (d3 / direct-02
                  :polarity -)))

comment: ... of PROTESTERS killed in Iran itself . While Iran will never be able to properly admit it , Soleimani was both hated and feared within the country . They are not nearly as saddened as the leaders will let the outside world believe . He should have been taken out many years ago !
